title: Dark Water Chronicles: A Brave New World by Sam Riding
description:
I've teamed up with Mr. Riding to bring you an exclusive series of noir danger and intrigue. A Lovecraft-like pasta that's a blast from the primordial past. I hope you all fall in love with it like I did.
